descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Background:[/size]
[size=3]There was once a great dragonslayer that protected the land of Skyrim from the vicious creatures. After defeating one of the strongest dragons in all of Tamriel, Alduin took it upon himself to eliminate the slayer. The slayer fought valiantly, but was no match for the great power of Alduin. The nords buried him deep in a tomb, guarded by the strongest of dragons he had slain. The tomb was thought to be lost forever, but has been recently re-discovered by the people of Winterhold. Test your skills and prove yourself the greatest dragonslayer in all of Tamriel.[/size]

[size=4]Location:[/size]
[size=3]Dragon Tomb can be found west of Winterhold as seen below.[/size]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/7GLUMBc.jpg[/img][/center]
[size=4]Other Mods:[/size]
[size=3]-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72682/?]Kunthar Keep[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54535/?]Dread Prison[/url]
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38510/?]Dwarven Island[/url][/size]

[center][url=http://whateverdevelopment.com/][img]https://googledrive.com/host/0BzXa6dHAI--nalhZNVNGWnJ1eXc/whatever_development_transparent.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: Whatever Development
